Articles.Content:
(idan, I already had an odp platform under development quite a while ago http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/45627-Imperial-Zokesian-Shipyards-%28NEW-Drekevak-Fifteen%21%29?p=651157#post651157. This is just the product of that prototype.) Introducing, the re-loadable missile OBP 1 mk1! Meant as a disposable Multi-role Orbital-Defense and Bombardment Platform it is made with the knowledge that the secondary comm satellite is currently a target practice platform and the solar panels will be blasted off by rocket exhaust. The SLV has a lot of upgrade space left empty, and can easily achieve a high orbit without the use of the second stage. (The missiles are ridiculously fast...).

Download for the prototype with its new and nearly completely bare bones but very stable Booming Valkyrie SLV: https://www.dropbox.com/s/mnqoolyl5g5cywy/OBP%201.craft

Edited July 8, 2014 by andrew123
Is This The ODIN Satellite From CoD: Ghosts?

On 1/24/2016 at 8:58 PM, mehead1 said:

Is This The ODIN Satellite From CoD: Ghosts?

Mother of necro posts... And yes, that was my early (and rather terrible) attempt at mirroring it.

I had a later attempt (still long ago and rather unrefined).
